comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: It’s definitely on the backlog, not sure when it’ll be ready though.

comments.author: Elfo Bianco.3786
comments.body:
Unfortunately, to my knowledge, does not exist.
As you, I’d like to know the stats on items where the player chooses the stats.

comments.author: zMADMag.2859
comments.body:
Hi Guys

This is my first dabble in the API and I am having a great time. My questions is I seem to be having problems getting the stats on items where the player chooses the stats, for instance on Mawdrey, so my attribute calculator is missing any gains from items where the Stats are picked on acquire, is there any way to get this, am I missing something, TIA.
